member.name: P:Google.Apis.Tasks.v1.Data.Task.Completed
member.summary: Completion date of the task (as a RFC 3339 timestamp). This field is omitted if the task has not been completed.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Tasks.v1.Data.Task.Deleted
member.summary: Flag indicating whether the task has been deleted. The default if False.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Tasks.v1.Data.Task.Due
member.summary: Due date of the task (as a RFC 3339 timestamp). Optional.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Tasks.v1.Data.Task.ETag
member.summary: ETag of the resource.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Tasks.v1.Data.Task.Hidden
member.summary: Flag indicating whether the task is hidden. This is the case if the task had been marked completed when the task list was last cleared. The default is False. This field is read-only.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Tasks.v1.Data.Task.Id
member.summary: Task identifier.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Tasks.v1.Data.Task.Kind
member.summary: Type of the resource. This is always "tasks#task".

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Tasks.v1.Data.Task.Links
member.summary: Collection of links. This collection is read-only.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Tasks.v1.Data.Task.Notes
member.summary: Notes describing the task. Optional.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Tasks.v1.Data.Task.Parent
member.summary: Parent task identifier. This field is omitted if it is a top-level task. This field is read-only. Use the "move" method to move the task under a different parent or to the top level.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Tasks.v1.Data.Task.Position
member.summary: String indicating the position of the task among its sibling tasks under the same parent task or at the top level. If this string is greater than another task's corresponding position string according to lexicographical ordering, the task is positioned after the other task under the same parent task (or at the top level). This field is read-only. Use the "move" method to move the task to another position.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Tasks.v1.Data.Task.SelfLink
member.summary: URL pointing to this task. Used to retrieve, update, or delete this task.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Tasks.v1.Data.Task.Status
member.summary: Status of the task. This is either "needsAction" or "completed".

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Tasks.v1.Data.Task.Title
member.summary: Title of the task.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Tasks.v1.Data.Task.Updated
member.summary: Last modification time of the task (as a RFC 3339 timestamp).

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Tasks.v1.Data.Task.LinksData.Description
member.summary: The description. In HTML speak: Everything between and .

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Tasks.v1.Data.Task.LinksData.Link
member.summary: The URL.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Tasks.v1.Data.Task.LinksData.Type
member.summary: Type of the link, e.g. "email".

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Tasks.v1.Data.TaskList.ETag
member.summary: ETag of the resource.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Tasks.v1.Data.TaskList.Id
member.summary: Task list identifier.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Tasks.v1.Data.TaskList.Kind
member.summary: Type of the resource. This is always "tasks#taskList".

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Tasks.v1.Data.TaskList.SelfLink
member.summary: URL pointing to this task list. Used to retrieve, update, or delete this task list.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Tasks.v1.Data.TaskList.Title
member.summary: Title of the task list.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Tasks.v1.Data.TaskList.Updated
member.summary: Last modification time of the task list (as a RFC 3339 timestamp).

member.summary: ETag of the resource.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Tasks.v1.Data.TaskLists.Items
member.summary: Collection of task lists.

member.summary: Type of the resource. This is always "tasks#taskLists".

member.summary: Token that can be used to request the next page of this result.

member.summary: ETag of the resource.

member.summary: Collection of tasks.

member.summary: Type of the resource. This is always "tasks#tasks".

member.summary: Token used to access the next page of this result.

member.summary: Sets the API-Key (or DeveloperKey) which this service uses for all requests

member.summary: A list of all OAuth2.0 scopes. Each of these scopes relates to a permission or group of permissions that different methods of this API may need.

member.name: M:Google.Apis.Tasks.v1.TasksResource.Clear(System.String)
member.summary: Clears all completed tasks from the specified task list. The affected tasks will be marked as 'hidden' and no longer be returned by default when retrieving all tasks for a task list.

member.name: M:Google.Apis.Tasks.v1.TasksResource.Delete(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Deletes the specified task from the task list.

member.name: M:Google.Apis.Tasks.v1.TasksResource.Get(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns the specified task.

member.name: M:Google.Apis.Tasks.v1.TasksResource.Insert(Google.Apis.Tasks.v1.Data.Task,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new task on the specified task list.

member.name: M:Google.Apis.Tasks.v1.TasksResource.List(System.String)
member.summary: Returns all tasks in the specified task list.

member.name: M:Google.Apis.Tasks.v1.TasksResource.Move(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Moves the specified task to another position in the task list. This can include putting it as a child task under a new parent and/or move it to a different position among its sibling tasks.

member.name: M:Google.Apis.Tasks.v1.TasksResource.Patch(Google.Apis.Tasks.v1.Data.Task,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Updates the specified task. This method supports patch semantics.

member.summary: Updates the specified task.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Tasks.v1.TasksResource.ListRequest.CompletedMax
member.summary: Upper bound for a task's completion date (as a RFC 3339 timestamp) to filter by. Optional. The default is not to filter by completion date.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Tasks.v1.TasksResource.ListRequest.CompletedMin
member.summary: Lower bound for a task's completion date (as a RFC 3339 timestamp) to filter by. Optional. The default is not to filter by completion date.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Tasks.v1.TasksResource.ListRequest.DueMax
member.summary: Upper bound for a task's due date (as a RFC 3339 timestamp) to filter by. Optional. The default is not to filter by due date.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Tasks.v1.TasksResource.ListRequest.DueMin
member.summary: Lower bound for a task's due date (as a RFC 3339 timestamp) to filter by. Optional. The default is not to filter by due date.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Tasks.v1.TasksResource.ListRequest.MaxResults
member.summary: Maximum number of task lists returned on one page. Optional. The default is 100.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Tasks.v1.TasksResource.ListRequest.PageToken
member.summary: Token specifying the result page to return. Optional.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Tasks.v1.TasksResource.ListRequest.ShowCompleted
member.summary: Flag indicating whether completed tasks are returned in the result. Optional. The default is True.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Tasks.v1.TasksResource.ListRequest.ShowDeleted
member.summary: Flag indicating whether deleted tasks are returned in the result. Optional. The default is False.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Tasks.v1.TasksResource.ListRequest.ShowHidden
member.summary: Flag indicating whether hidden tasks are returned in the result. Optional. The default is False.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Tasks.v1.TasksResource.ListRequest.Tasklist
member.summary: Task list identifier.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Tasks.v1.TasksResource.ListRequest.UpdatedMin
member.summary: Lower bound for a task's last modification time (as a RFC 3339 timestamp) to filter by. Optional. The default is not to filter by last modification time.
